General.Name: Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells motor vehicle and aero tires in Thailand. It provides private automobile tires, and small and large truck tires for commercial use; and aviation tires and tire retreads. The company also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand. Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company.
General.Address: 50/9 Moo 3, Phaholyothin Road, K.M. 36, Pathum Thani, Thailand, 12120
